items.title: Team Collaboration Features
items.description: Enable multiple users to collaborate on shared tasks and projects within the app.
acceptance_criteria: Users can create shared projects accessible to multiple team members
Team members can assign tasks to each other
Changes to tasks are updated in real-time for all members
Users can comment on tasks and tag other members
non_functional: Real-time updates must have latency under 500ms
System must support at least 100 concurrent active users per project

notes: Requirement is high-level; specific collaboration tools (e.g., chat, file sharing) not detailed. Assumed core collaboration includes shared projects, task assignment, comments, and real-time updates.
